attributes.action: Change the criteria for NHS funded IVF cycles so that they are the same
attributes.additional_details: Currently, access varies significantly depending on where you live – a 'postcode lottery' that unfairly affects people’s chances of starting a family. All individuals should have the same rights and opportunities to access IVF, regardless of their geographic location.
attributes.background: Ensure equal access to NHS-funded IVF treatment across England by standardising the eligibility criteria.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Increase funding for IVF & fertility treatments to increase access.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711621
